ModMetaData.name: ExtendedFabrics (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Skullywag
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Skullywags mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=731731177
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/ExtendedFabrics
- Replaced plant-defs with patches - Added stack-graphics for cotton ball and devilstrand thread
--- Original Description --- Adds another step in fabric production, also makes Synthread and Hyperweave craftable.
Credit to Telkir for the cotton boll texture.
